channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12793] [hbck] closeRegionSilentlyAndWait() should log cause of IOException and retry until hbase.hbck.close.timeout expires
item.description: This is subtask on HBASE-12131 in order to handle gracefully network partitions.
item.summary: [hbck] closeRegionSilentlyAndWait() should log cause of IOException and retry until hbase.hbck.close.timeout expires

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12689649/0001-HBASE-12793-hbck-closeRegionSilentlyAndWait-should-l.patch
against master branch at commit 8514e2b20e4d9b4c4f1985392d6e93381ab37cc7.

Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

This message is automatically generated.
Hanging tests in TestHBaseFsck seem to be related to the patch.

Ted Yu Don't think is related, see this Ted:

TestHBaseFsck.java:2459 -> admin.createTable(desc);
TestMasterObserver.java:1605 -> UTIL.deleteTable(TEST_TABLE);

I tried tests that use TestHBaseFsck before uploading the patch and they don't hang. Perhaps jenkins acting just odd, same tests in TestMasterObserver has hanged before, see: HBASE-12684
Re-attach for QA run

This message is automatically generated.

Last failure is interesting, HBaseFsckRepair.closeRegionSilentlyAndWait() was just hanging in a Thread.sleep(1000) I think my patch has uncovered an IOE that we basically ignored and now we need to wait the full 2 mins from hbase.hbck.close.timeout.

The problem seems that is triggered by setupTableWithRegionReplica since it calls admin.createTable() instead of HBaseTestingUtility.createTable() which waits until all regions are assigned via waitUntilAllRegionsAssigned()
